data.name: DaysofTheWeekInWeeklyRetentionException
data.value: The DaysOfWeek specified in a weekly retention schedule should be same as of DaysOfWeek value specified in the backup schedule

data.value: The DaysOfWeek specified for monthly and yearly retention policies should be a subset of the DaysOfWeek value specified in the backup schedule

data.name: BackupAndRetentionTimesMismatch
data.value: RetentionTime in retention schedule should be same as backup time specified in SchedulePolicy

data.name: DailyRetentionScheduleNullException
data.value: Daily Retention Schedule can't be null (or) IsDailyScheduleEnabled should be 'true' if Daily Backup Schedule is enabled

data.value: RetentionPolicy: IsDailyScheduleEnabled=true but DailySchedule is NULL

data.value: Only one BackupTime is Allowed in SchedulePolicy

data.name: InvalidDurationTypeException

data.name: InvalidRetentionTimesInPolicyException
data.value: Only one RetentionTime is Allowed in RetentionSchedules

data.name: MonthlyScheduleEnabledButScheduleIsNullException
data.value: RetentionPolicy: IsMonthlyScheduleEnabled=true but MonthlySchedule is NULL

data.name: MonthlyYearlyInvalidDailyRetentionFormatTypeException
data.value: In Monthly and Yearly retention schedules, RetentionFormatType cannot be 'Daily' if Weekly BackupSchedule is selected

data.name: RetentionDurationCountInvalidException
data.value: RetentionDuration in Days/Weeks/Months/Years should be from 1 - 9999

data.name: WeeklyRetentionScheduleNullException
data.value: If Weekly backup schedule is enabled, then IsDailyScheduleEnabled should be false and Weekly retention schedule should not be null, IsWeeklyScheduleEnabled should be true

data.name: WeeklyScheduleEnabledButScheduleIsNullException
data.value: RetentionPolicy: IsWeeklyScheduleEnabled=true but WeeklySchedule is NULL

data.name: YearlyScheduleEnabledButScheduleIsNullException
data.value: RetentionPolicy: IsYearlyScheduleEnabled=true but YearlySchedule is NULL

data.name: YearlyScheduleMonthsOfYearException
data.value: MonthsOfYear list in YearlyRetentionSchedule should not be NULL and not contain duplicate entires

data.name: InvalidDayInDaysOfMonthOfMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, Day in DaysOfMonth should be 1-28 (or) IsLast=true set for one day only

data.name: InvalidDaysOfMonthInMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, DaysOfMonth is NULL or empty or contains duplicate entires

data.name: InvalidDaysOfWeekInMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, DaysOfWeek is NULL or empty or contains duplicate entires

data.name: InvalidScheduleRunDaysInScheduleException
data.value: In Schedule, if ScheduleRunFrequency is Weekly then ScheduleRunDays should not be empty and not contain duplicate entries

data.name: InvalidScheduleTimeInScheduleException
data.value: ScheduleTimes in Schedule should be in UTC Timezone, have ONE time and must be of multiples of 30 Mins with seconds and milliseconds set to 0

data.name: InvalidWeeksOfMonthInMonthlyYearlyRetentionPolicyException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, WeeksOfMonth is NULL or empty or contains duplicate entires

data.name: MonthlyYearlyRetentionDailySchedulePolicyNULLException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, if RetentionScheduleFormatType=Daily then RetentionScheduleDaily should NOT be null

data.name: MonthlyYearlyRetentionWeeklySchedulePolicyNULLException
data.value: In Monthly/Yearly retention schedule, if RetentionScheduleFormatType=Weekly then RetentionScheduleWeekly should NOT be null

data.name: AzureVMNotFound
data.value:
The specified Azure Virtual Machine Not Found. Possible causes are 1. VM does not exist 2. The VM name or the Service name needs to be case sensitive 3. VM is already Protected with same or other Vault. Please Unprotect VM first and then try to protect it again.
Please contact Microsoft for further assistance.

data.name: AzureFileShareNotFound
data.value: Looks like File Shares similar to specified Azure File Share are not found. Possible causes are 1. The Azure File Share does not exist 2. The Azure File Share is already protected with same Vault. Please unprotect the Azure File Shares first and then try to protect it again. 3. The Azure File Share is already protected with another Vault. Please unprotect the Azure File Share first, unregister the Storage Account from that Vault and protect it again. Please contact Microsoft for further assistance.

data.name: StorageAccountNameShouldNotBeEmpty
data.value: For Azure File share, Storage account name can not be empty

data.name: RetentionDurationCountInDaysInvalidException
data.value: RetentionDuration in Days should be from 7 - 9999

data.name: ProtectedItemsCountExceededException
data.value: Cannot configure backup for more than 1000 VMs per policy

data.name: AFSDiscoveryFailure
data.value: Failed to discover FileShare {0} under {1}. Please make sure names are correct and FileShare is not deleted

data.name: FriendlyNamePassedWarning
data.value: A friendly name might return multiple items since it is not unique. To get a unique item, please use the -name parameter. Pass the value displayed under the name column when displayed as a table or use the name field in the PS object

data.name: TargetContainerRequiredException
data.value: Target Container parameter is required for this operation.

data.name: AFSWeeklyScheduleNotAllowed
data.value: Weekly Backup Schedule for Azure File Share policy is not allowed. Please give Daily Schedule input instead.

data.name: DiskExclusionParametersRedundant
data.value: Multiple Parameters Provided. Please specify only one of the parameters from InclusionDisksList, ExclusionDisksList, ResetExclusionSetting and ExcludeAllDataDisks.

data.name: InclusionListRedundantError
data.value: Both Inclusion and Exclusion lists provided. Please provide only one of them.

data.name: TargetRGUnmanagedRestoreDuplicateParamsException
data.value: Both RestoreAsUnmanagedDisks and TargetResourceGroupName can't be spceified. Please give Only one parameter and retry.

data.name: UnmanagedVMRestoreWarning
data.value: This is a managed disk recovery point and hence please provide a target resource group for the managed disks to be restored into with the TargetResourceGroupName parameter. Otherwise, please explicitly state that the managed disks should be restored into the staging storage account as unmanaged disks with restoreAsUnmanagedDisks parameter

data.name: AzureFileSourceFilePathRedundantException
data.value: Both source file path and multiple source file paths provided. Please give only one option

data.name: TargetVaultNotEmptyException
data.value: Please provide an empty target vault. The target vault should not have any backup items or backup containers

data.name: TargetVaultStorageRedundancy
data.value: Are you sure you want to copy items to the {0} whose storage redundancy is {1}

data.name: TargetResourcegroupNotSupported
data.value: Target ResourceGroup is not applicable and restore will proceed as unmanaged disk restore since this is unmanaged VM

data.name: InvalidTargetStorageAccount
data.value: Please provide a vaild target storage account
